conditions.short_description: Some new snow in highest mountains, but it has rained in the lowlands. Ongoing snowfall on the night before Thursday and decreasing shower of snow in Friday. Less snow in the south than in the north.
conditions.full_description: Some new snow in highest mountains, but it has rained in the lowlands. Ongoing snowfall on the night before Thursday and decreasing shower of snow in Friday. Less snow in the south than in the north. Thin windslabs can be expected on old firn. Wind slab likely in all aspects due to variable wind directions in the last few days.

area_forecast.forecast: Snow has melted and subsided, and is considered stable.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Snow has melted and subsided, and is considered stable. Continued mild weather and occasional showers of rain or sleet, wet loose avalanches or small sluffs cannot be ruled out.
area_forecast.weather: Suðaustan 3-8 og stöku skúrir eða slydduél. Hiti 1 til 7 stig.

area_forecast.forecast: Strong NE wind and snow the next days. The formation of unstable wind slabs can be expected on south to west-facing aspects.
area_forecast.recent_avalances: Wet slab in Naustahvilft 19th of March.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Snow is forecasted in strong NE wind on Wednesday and Thursday. Wind slabs are likely to form and may be unstable. A small amount of snow fell in the mountains on Monday in easterly winds. The older snowpack is generally considered stable.
area_forecast.weather: Norðaustan 13-20 og snjókoma miðvikudagskvöld, en úrkomulítið eftir hádegi á fimmtudag. Hiti nálægt frostmarki.

area_forecast.forecast: New snow in the area in high mountains and slabs could be present at high elevations. Older snow has settled and become mostly stable, but older slabs might persist in higher elevations. NE wind and snow showers on Thursday and Friday, forming wind slabs in S-W aspects.
area_forecast.snow_condition: The old snow is considered mostly stable. Some old wind slabs could be present in gullies and depressions at higher elevations. New snow added in the last few days in high elevations and wind slabs possible in N to E aspects after stiff SW wind on Monday and in S to W aspects due to snow and NE wind on Thursday and Friday.
area_forecast.weather: Áframhaldandi NA átt og él á fimmtudag en fer minnkandi með föstudeginum. Hæg breytileg átt á laugardag og þurrt að mestu.

area_forecast.forecast: Little or no snow at low elevations and hard packed snow in the mountains with a thin cover of new snow. Softer snow is present in ravines and depressions. New wind slabs possible.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Little or no snow is at low elevations and hard packed snow is in the mountains with a thin cover of new snow. The new snow could drift to southerly aspects in northerly wind.
area_forecast.weather: N-átt og stöku él á fimmtudag og föstudag, hæg breytileg átt á sunnudag og einhver úrkoma.

weather_forecast.forecast: NE10-20 m/s and snow in the north, strongest wind in the northwest. Southwest 10-15 and rain showers in the south, but 13-18 m/s at the southeast coast. E/NE 5-13 m/s tomorrow, but 10-18 in Vestfirdir. Light snow or snow showers in N Iceland and temperature near or below freezing. A few showers of rain or sleet in the south part and temperature 0 to 7 deg. C.
